cheeseburger.Recipe: cook ground beef until brown. Apply cheese. Once melted, apply to bun.

Waffle.Description: Rectangular Breakfast bread. Fried chicken not included.
Waffle.Recipe: whisk ingredients together, pour in waffle iron. Remove once done.

Cheese Pizza.Description: Doesn't come with pineapple, but should.
Cheese Pizza.Recipe: apply marinara and cheese to dough. Bake.

Caesar Salad.Description: A salad even Augustus would love.
Caesar Salad.Recipe: Mix all ingredients, be cautious of knives.

Fried Chicken.Description: Best with waffles. Skip the syrup.

Nachos.Description: Just like your school cafeteria used to make.
Nachos.Recipe: Put fried tortilla triangles on baking sheet. Apply cheese facsimile. Bake. Ignore how cheese never gets hot.
